resources: Bönetider It\'s time for %1$s Prayer time Notifies when it\'s time for prayers Compass North Precision: High Precision: Medium Precision: Low Precision: Error Timetable Settings City Method Use 24-hour format Notify before adhan Minutes before adhan Hijri calendar offset Test Notification Prayer times The prayer times displayed in the app are calculated using these settings. Notifications Turn prayer notifications on or off and customize how long before the prayer time you want to receive the notifications.\ Corrections Use these settings to correct values shown on the app when they are not accurate (eg: Hijri calendar). Development The app is open-source and free to use under the MIT license, inviting everyone to contribute or share feedback to help improve it. You can explore the source code or contribute via its GitHub repository. Source code on Github https://bönetider.nu Read privacy policy Fajr Sunrise Dhuhr Asr Maghrib Isha Islamiska Förbundet This app provides accurate Islamic prayer times sourced directly from the Islamiska Förbundet website that calculates times based on the method described here: https://www.islamiskaforbundet.se/bonetiders-kalla/. 12-hour 24-hour %d mins Disabled %d days Disabled Prayer Times Next Prayer Next prayer time in %dh, %dmins in %dmins %1$s prayer begins at %2$s
